Text:

You can also see Hell House, a hard-to-find documentary comparable to Jesus Camp.
This movie reminded me of my Catholic high school that made us do weird stuff too.  Good torrent.

Ah! So that's why Americans are stupid!
They make kids go to camps and create a ''army of jesus'' at such an early age!

Interesting to note, that in the 1600's, the "rednecks" or "covenanters" or "Scots-Irish presbyterians" were originally kicked out of Britaln for agitating for the overthrow of the Monarchy and setting up a Theocratic state. So it's a long tradition with these people.
